pr.title: feat(family): Add /family dashboard shell (visual + routing + auth gate) with placeholder data
pr.rollback: Revert PR or delete web/src/app/family/ and web/src/components/family/. No DB/RLS changes.

receipt.goal: Add authenticated /family route (Manage My Family dashboard) as visual shell matching Figma; no DB reads/writes; placeholder data only.
commands_run: cd web && pnpm install && pnpm run build
qa_steps: Signed out: go to /family → see 'Sign in to manage your family' and Sign in CTA
Signed in: go to /family → see full shell (header, child chip, personalization strip, My list tabs, Want+Gift controls, Next steps, Reminders, Settings)
Build: cd web && pnpm install && pnpm run build passes
receipt.rollback: Revert PR. Delete web/src/app/family/ and web/src/components/family/ if needed.
